thread.title: Don’t Overlook Netflix’s Big Picture
thread.title_full: Don’t Overlook Netflix’s Big Picture - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Don’t Overlook Netflix’s Big Picture
text:
Netflix Inc., now 5 miles high.
The video company’s deal with airline Virgin America is just one of dozens of exciting announcements that have helped propel Netflix’s stock over 1,000% in the past three years and pushed its market value to around $47 billion. But while news about entering new markets and winning Emmys sound great, what about the 30,000-foot view?
Netflix’s third-quarter results announcement Wednesday is a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
